title:
A priori error estimates for optimal control problems governed by the
  transient Stokes equations and subject to state constraints pointwise in time
authors: Dmitriy Leykekhman, Boris Vexler and Jakob Wagner
abstract:
In this paper, we consider a state constrained optimal control problem
governed by the transient Stokes equations. The state constraint is given by an
L2 functional in space, which is required to fulfill a pointwise bound in time.
The discretization scheme for the Stokes equations consists of inf-sup stable
finite elements in space and a discontinuous Galerkin method in time, for which
we have recently established best approximation type error estimates. Using
these error estimates, for the discrete control problem we establish error
estimates and as a by-product we show an improved regularity for the optimal
control. We complement our theoretical analysis with numerical results.
